title: Real-Time Chat App
description: The real-time chat app, built using the MERN stack and Socket.io, offers features like secure authentication (JWT) and real-time messaging.

title: Word to Pdf convertor
description: The Word to Pdf converter web app allows users to upload Word files and convert them into editable Pdf documents. It is designed with a user-friendly interface.

title: Vacational Rental Marketplace
description: It is an Airbnb clone that allows users to list, explore, and book vacation properties with features like authentication, property filtering, and booking management.
